description: Command group to manage load test run server-metrics.

commands.name: az load test-run server-metric add
commands.summary: Add a server-metric to a test run.
examples: az load test-run server-metric add --test-run-id sample-test-run-id --load-test-resource sample-alt-resource --resource-group sample-rg --metric-id "/subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/Sample-rg/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets/sample-temp-vmss/providers/microsoft.insights/metricdefinitions/Percentage CPU" --metric-name  "Percentage CPU" --metric-namespace microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets --aggregation Average --app-component-type Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets --app-component-id /subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/sample-rg/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets/app-comp-name

commands.name: az load test-run server-metric list
commands.summary: List all server-metrics for a test run.
examples: az load test-run server-metric list --test-run-id sample-test-run-id --load-test-resource sample-alt-resource --resource-group sample-rg

commands.name: az load test-run server-metric remove
commands.summary: Remove a server-metric from a test run.
examples: az load test-run server-metric remove --test-run-id sample-test-run-id --load-test-resource sample-alt-resource --resource-group sample-rg --metric-id "/subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/Sample-rg/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets/Sample-temp-vmss/providers/microsoft.insights/metricdefinitions/Percentage CPU" --yes
